title: How to deploy a cloud-based office suite to your home network
description: In our quest to bring a number of services to our home network, it's now time to add an in-house, cloud-based office suite.

title: This is the free note-taking app for macOS you've been looking for
description: If you're looking for a simple note-taking app for macOS, you cannot go wrong with this remarkably effective and unobtrusive app.

title: How to spruce up your Facebook Messenger chats by adding a theme
description: Facebook Messenger has a hidden gem of an option to make chatting with friends, family, and others a bit more fun.

title: The price of replacing your iPhone battery has gone up
description: Replacing your iPhone batteries just got a bit more expensive.

title: Now Microsoft has a new AI model - Kosmos-1
description: Microsoft's Kosmos-1 can take image and audio prompts, paving the way for the next stage beyond ChatGPT's text prompts.

title: The next big threat to AI might already be lurking on the web
description: Artificial intelligence experts warn attacks against datasets used to train machine-learning tools are worryingly cheap and could have major consequences.

title: TikTok: Why is it being banned from government devices?
description: US and Canadian federal governments, along with the European Parliament, have banned TikTok on federal government-issued devices. Here's why.

title: The Epson WorkForce Pro wireless printer is now $120 off
description: You can save $120 -- or even more if you are willing to trade in your old printer.
